title: Ecuador's Latest Free Trade Agreements Aim for Economic Growth - Bloomberg Tax
summary: Ecuador has signed free trade agreements with South Korea, China, and Costa Rica to promote economic growth, attract foreign investment, and increase exports. These agreements offer tax benefits to exporters and aim to reduce tariffs on imports and exports, facilitating the flow of goods and services.  The agreements also highlight the need for Ecuadorian businesses to improve quality and efficiency to compete with foreign products.
greenwashing: The article does not provide information on greenwashing.
